about_the_game:
Shrimpwrecked is a short-and-sweet crunchy shooter!

As Above, So Below

You are a once care-free shrimp, now thrust into a chaotic battle fighting against an unknown enemy. Following an alarming amount of debris plummeting down from above, the other ocean creatures began to slowly act aggressively and unpredictably. Amongst a flurry of violence, you hide behind a strange object. Upon touching it, you are flooded with knowledge.

Shreds Of Memories

You see horrific, whirring beings, piloting crafts in darkness dotted with piercing light. Aggression towards one another. The wreckage plummeting into the ocean. Terrible weapons disguised as musical instruments float into the depths of the ocean. And a strange energy, radiating from a mother ship, driving the ocean creatures mad to prevent them from coveting the precious devices.

While My Guitar Djently Sweeps

  • Ride your guitar from the ocean deep to deep space to destroy the corrupted ocean creatures and the mother ship!
  • From the Epipelagic Zone to the Hadalpelagic Zone, battle the residents from all sides
  • Drawn to a horrible creature in the utmost depths, you know felling them will allow you passage to outer space
  • Enjoy ~20 minute sessions against ocean waves of dynamic foes
  • Blowfish
  • What else would you like? Please share your thoughts :D

Going In For The Krill

Fighting for the fate of all beings on earth, you must pilot your flame-spouting axe and destroy the present to save the future. There is no time to spare; Let's head into the darkness prawnto!

  • Graphics: Pixel Shader Capable Graphics Card

short_description: Riding an extra-terrestrial weapon disguised as a guitar, battle to the bottom of the ocean deep to turn the tides of impending worldly destruction; krill or be killed!
